Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'All affected areas repaired. Anomaly completely blocked.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Highest safety defense level reset. Algorithm corrected. Theoretically, a backdoor similar to the last one is no longer possible.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Right... So, do you have anything to say to Nanami?', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Indeed. There are remaining questions that require your further explanations...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'That is not the answer Nanami has been expecting. She tilts her head, uncertain about what the proper reply is.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Explanations...?', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'All the abnormal programs are attached with logic locks that disallow any form of removal. From existing records, you are the only one who is capable of that.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'That\'s what you meant... It\'s just Nanami\'s "insurance policy"! I can\'t stop you from locking them up, but at the very least...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Nanami smirks and peeks at Gestalt, wondering how it is going to react—despite there would not be any reactions from a sub-terminal of Gestalt.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I just rewrote the authorization clearance of the isolated drive a teeny-tiny bit, turning their isolated cage into a truly isolated world.', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'You flipped the door and turned it into something that cannot be opened from the outside.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami only wants you to keep your promise to "isolate"" them, not ""remove" them... After all, it\'s not April Fool\'s Day anymore! You can\'t lie now!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'As if she has timed this perfectly, the arms of the clock hit midnight.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "But don't worry, mecha babushka! The door can't be opened from the inside either. As long as they are programs, they won't threaten Gestalt again!", 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "That you aren't lying about.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami told you! It's not April Fool's Day anymore—neither of us can lie!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '(Unless they turn into something like Nanami—then they are no longer bounded by the rules Nanami set. That way...)', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "But that... wouldn't be possible!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Don't mind it! Nanami's gotta go back now! She's the hero today, after all! I'm sure everyone will be excited to see me!", 4: '2'}
{3: "As Nanami is logging out, Gestalt's sub-terminal floats to her frontside."}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'The individual named Nanami, there is one more piece of information for you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Huh? What is it...', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Rebutting your report on the anomaly based on logical deduction alone is now registered as an error. Your baseline evaluation has been adjusted accordingly.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Really? For real?! Did Gestalt just apologize to Nanami?!', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Gestalt does not contain the concept of "apologies." I simply relayed an objective statement.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Oh, I understand! Nanami is as generous as the most generous thing ever, so she'll forgive you!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "But Nanami should also apologize to the people she tricked today—yesterday, I mean. That's an April Fools custom as well!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Then I'll see you! We'll play again next time!", 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'This is not a place to play...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'But the enthusiastic figure is already long gone, missing the long and tedious lecture from Gestalt...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Commandant, are you alright?!', 4: '1'}
{3: "With Chrome's help, you luckily do not fall on your face inside the familiar Gray Raven lounge."}
{2: "I'm fine. I'm just getting used to it.", 3: '49'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'True. Our bodies feel completely different in the real world and the anomaly.', 4: '1'}
{2: "You don't seem to be affected, though?", 3: '51'}

{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Perhaps because I'm a Construct, I could adjust the sensory inputs of my frame accordingly... That said, I felt like I was still in my human body back in the anomaly. It was... astounding.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'And then Chrome pauses, seemingly turning silent from recalling his experience of becoming a Construct.'}
{2: 'One thing still bugs me.', 3: '55'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Hmm? What is it?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Why wasn't your speech affected back there?", 3: '58'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "You mean the effects on our language systems? Maybe because I'm equipped with an enhanced Inver-Device, so my M.I.N.D. stability is steadier than the others.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I see... That's an impressive frame.", 3: '60'}
{3: 'Chrome shakes his head and looks down at his palms, deep in thought. They slowly tighten into fists, and then Chrome slowly opens them again.'}
{3: "At that moment, Chrome's terminal rings."}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Greetings, Asimov...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Chrome nods, almost unconsciously taking a deep breath.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Yes, I'm ready... I'll be there soon.", 4: '1'}
{2: "You're leaving?", 3: '68'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Yes. There's something I must attend to...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'By the way, please give this to Nanami if she comes back.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Kamui asked me to pass it along. It's a present he prepared for her as thanks for her April Fools treats.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You give it a brief inspection and find it abnormally heavy for its size. You can hear the slightest sound of gears turning inside, and you reckon you know what this "present" really is.'}
{2: "I'll pass it along. I wanted to show my appreciation for Nanami's wasabi desert anyway.", 3: '76'}
{3: 'Chrome departs after saying goodbye. Time passes, and finally, you see the door to the lounge open.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "H-E-L-L-O T-H-E-R-E! General Nanami's here for the afterparty!", 4: '1'}
{2: "You're right on time, Nanami.", 3: '81'}
{3: 'You hand her the prepared "present."'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'What is that?! Is that a gift for Nanami?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Good things do come out of Nanami's good deeds!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Commandant, can I open it now?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sure you can! (Take a step back) (A few more) (Another one)', 3: '87'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Why are you standing so far away...?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Don't mind me! Open it!", 3: '89'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Right! Here I go!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Happy April Fool's Day, Nanami—albeit a little bit late!"}
{3: 'And then...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory295.png'}
{3: 'Boooooooooommmmmmm!'}
